name: Vanquished
description:
Vanquished is a 2.5D Soulslike platformer set in a dark fantasy world. Take control of a Knight and navigate through various environments while fighting a wide range of enemies. Meet different characters and know more about the world you are in and the challenges you are to face.

GAMEPLAY
- Your every move consumes stamina. Good stamina management is the key to victory.
- Find Bonfires distributed throughout the world. You can rest and replenish your health and supplies there.
- Bonfires also act as Fast Travel points.
- Collect Skill Points by killing enemies. Spend these points at any Bonfire to Upgrade your Stats and bonuses.
- You have a limited supply of healing potions at your disposal. Consume them to regain lost health.
- Remember your path, Unlock shortcuts and defeat Boss Guardians to find the hidden treasure and reclaim your Glory!!!
